name: Karen
text: AI Initializing... Initialization complete. IRIS class AI ready for duty. Good morning, Captain.

name: Jack
text: Good morning, Karen, what do we have scheduled for today?

name: Karen
text: A standard scouting and raiding mission.

name: Jack
text: Well that sounds simple enough. Let's get to it then!

name: Karen
text: Wait a moment, Captain. We still have remaining funds from our previous run.

name: Karen
text: I would recommend using some of those funds to purchase upgrades prior to today's mission.

name: Jack
text: Want some more toys to play with, Karen? Alright, let's see what the mechanics have on sale.
